verses:
Let your living water
flow over my soul,
Let your hely Spirit come
and take control,
Of ev'ry situation that
has troubled my mind.
All my care and burdens
onto you I - roll.

Come now Holy Spirit
and take control,
Hold me in your loving arms
and make me whole,
Wipe away all doubt
and fear and take my pride,
Draw me to your love
and keep me by your side

Give your life to Jesus
let him fill your soul,
Let him take you in his arms
and make you whole,
As you give your life
to Him He'll set you free,
You will live and reign
with hina eternally.
chorus:
Jesus, Jesus, Jesus.
Father, Father, Father.
Spirit, Spirit, Spirit.
